content.query:
USE gold_db
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC createSQLServerlessView_gold @ViewName NVARCHAR(100)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)

    SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + @ViewName + ' AS
        SELECT *
        FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK ''https://dlbankcustomerchurn.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/Bank_Churn/geography=' + @ViewName + '/'',
            FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
        ) AS [result];'

    EXEC (@statement)
END
GO
